name: Only we know the things we lost in the fire
name_original: Only we know the things we lost in the fire
description:
A small interactive story about bonds, memories and friendship.

---------------------------------

Made in less than 36hs for GMTK 2021 jam: "Joined Together".

The poem at the end is from my friend Ezequiel Fierro, go check his work (Spanish mostly!)

TW: small mentions of physical abuse. 
---------------------------------
Eventualmente lo voy a traducir al castellano, pero not today.
